title: Hokuou Kizoku to Moukinzuma no Yukiguni Karigurashi - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Josei   Romance   Slice of Life
tags: Adapted to Manga   Androgynous Characters   Carefree Protagonist   Cohabitation   Cooking   Crafting   Cute Story   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   European Ambience   Hard-Working Protagonist   Heartwarming   Love at First Sight   Male Protagonist   Marriage   Multiple POV   Nobles   Older Love Interests   Pregnancy   Protagonist Falls in Love First   R-15   Stoic Characters   Time Skip
author: Emoto Mashimesa   江本マシメサ
description: This story tells the life of two people, a noble only in name and an older wife from the army, married through a tentative agreement. In the bone-chilling cold, they spend their time hunting, gutting, and cooking by the fireplace. Their daily life passes peacefully. This is the warm love story recounting their daily lives.>
